results.name: First differences of A253770.
comment: Number of cells turned "ON" at n-th stage of cellular automaton of A253770.
Also 6 times the number of Y-toothpicks added at n-th stage in the Y-toothpick structure of A160120.
link: N. J. A. Sloane, Catalog of Toothpick and Cellular Automata Sequences in the OEIS
